data.eml:eml: Four new species of free-living marine nematodes of the family Comesomatidae (Nematoda: Araeolaimida) from coast of Vietnam

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gagarin, Vladimir G. (2013): Four new species of free-living marine nematodes of the family Comesomatidae (Nematoda: Araeolaimida) from coast of Vietnam. Zootaxa 3608 (7): 547-560, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3608.7.2
